scripts.pretest: coffee -c pico.coffee replicate.coffee couchdb_rewrite_url.coffee; (cd test && ./start-couchdb.sh &); sleep 5
scripts.test: coffee -e 'pico = require "./pico"; pico.test()' && coffee -e 'couchdb_rewrite_url = require "./couchdb_rewrite_url"; couchdb_rewrite_url.test()'
scripts.posttest: rm -f pico.js replicate.js couchdb_rewrite_url.js && killall -g beam.smp
